invoice_title.reason: Large, top-left header text 'Invoice' indicating document type (visual header).

invoice_number.reason: Found in the invoice details block labeled 'Invoice # 12345' (label + numeric identifier in details area).

invoice_date.reason: Found in invoice details labeled 'Invoice date 08/01/2024'. Normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

due_date.reason: Found in invoice details labeled 'Due date 08/31/2024'. Normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

terms.reason: Found in the invoice details block as 'Terms Net 30' (payment terms near invoice metadata).

currency.reason: Dollar signs present next to line amounts and totals (e.g., $125, $650.00), indicating US dollars.

issuer.reason: Top-left contact block shows company name, address lines, phone, email and website grouped together (visual company/issuer block). Email lowercased; address lines trimmed.

bill_to.reason: Block labeled 'Bill To' contains recipient name and two address lines. No phone/email shown in that block.

pay_to.reason: No 'Pay To' or bank/account payment instructions visible on this document.

value.reason: First row under 'Product/Services' table: description 'Stone work', Qty/Hrs '3.4', Rate '$125', Amount '$425' (tabular alignment signals).
Second tabular row shows multi-word description 'Mulching, weeding, planting', Qty/Hrs '3', Rate '$75', Amount '$225' (columns alignment used to map fields).

line_items.reason: Line items extracted from the table under 'Product/Services | Qty/Hrs | Rate | Amount' using column positions and adjacent numeric currency values.

subtotal.reason: Labeled 'Subtotal' in the totals area with amount '$650.00' (visually near totals lines).

discount.reason: Totals area contains a 'Discount' line shown as '-$65.00' directly under Subtotal.

tax_amount.reason: Totals area shows 'Tax 8.5%' with corresponding amount '$49.73' (tax amount adjacent to tax label).

tax_rate.reason: Tax line label reads 'Tax 8.5%' indicating an 8.5% tax rate. Normalized as decimal 0.085.

total.reason: Prominent 'Total' label at bottom of totals area with amount '$634.73' (final payable amount).

payment_instructions.reason: No explicit payment instructions, bank details, or 'Pay To' block visible on this invoice (only contact info for issuer).

payment_terms_summary.reason: Summary derived from the 'Terms Net 30' label in the invoice details; repeats payment terms information.

document_reference.reason: No auxiliary document reference, file name, page number, or internal ref visible on the page.

notes.reason: No additional notes or footnotes present in the visible invoice area.
